bibl.title: Aus der Papyrussammlung Erzherzog Rainer in Wien.
Proceedings of the IX International Congress of Papyrology. Oslo, 19th-22nd August, 1958

bibl.note: Comporte l'édition d'une homologia relative à l'irrigation d'un vignoble. Fayum, VIe-VIIe s. après J.-C.

Proceedings of the IX International Congress of Papyrology. Oslo, 19th-22nd August, 1958 (Oslo, 1961) pp. 337-344.
